snippet.title: SPACE PIRATES AND ZOMBIES 2 Release Trailer
snippet.description:
SPACE PIRATES AND ZOMBIES 2 is about survival, salvage, and ship construction. Explore a living galaxy, claim territory, fight to protect it, and create your perfect mothership on the fly using parts salvaged from enemy wrecks.


Our Steam page
http://store.steampowered.com/app/252470/

Our GOG page
https://www.gog.com/game/space_pirates_and_zombies_2

Check us out at 
http://minmax-games.com/SpacePiratesAndZombies/

Music by Michael W. Pflug
